full_text: Page 3074 UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT MEMORANDUM Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York DATE: August 13, 2019 TO: Lamin N. Diaz, Warden FROM: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Psy.D., Ph.D., Forensic Psychologist (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) SUPERVISOR (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) SUBJECT: Epstein #76301-054 The following psychology externs work in the psychology department. They did not have any contact with Mr. Epstein. John Jay University of Hartford Philadelphia College of Osteopathic Medicine Adelphi University John Jay John Jay
